patthana8.47:1.1: Naupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.47:2.1: Naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno ca naanupādinno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.47:3.1: Naupādinnañca naanupādinnañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.47:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
